title: Bronze is a piece of shit and here is the deal
body:
I get players on my team abuse me who can't count, don't group and would rather leave me for dead, probably to have an escape goat.

I get enemies trying to defend me, even one very recently telling me he has never seen the kind of abuse I coped for no real reason.

I roam into other lanes, ping like a dog on heat and still get abused for not roaming or pinging, no joke, 30 seconds after I leave bot lane in the last game I get abused for not helping them enough... on top of that I get most damage, by quite a bit, I didn't feed, I tried to stay with my team, I pinged, I roamed, I stayed behind the team, the enemy was saying our bot lane lost the match and was bad, but no it is all still my fault according to two players on my own team.

I had NO issues in previous seasons when I was not in bronze.
I have had NO issues in Normals like this.
TT is a kids birthday compared to bronze.
And ARAM is nothing, not even one bit of abuse, not even when I am feeding and playing like shit.

The bronze players in this community in recent times have gone to shit and simply would rather yell and scream at each other than play like a team.

And to help make sure I can get my best lanes and actually give my best effort I am stuck in bronze until the team select also moves across to normals, because once it does, I am never going back to ranked, it's not fun and Rito are doing nothing about it.
